headline: American Tower Corporation’s (AMT) Dividend Strength and Valuation Make it a Strong Buy in 2025
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is included among the Best Strong Buy Dividend Stocks to Invest in Now. American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is an American real estate investment trust that focuses on owning, developing, and managing wireless and broadcast communications infrastructure across multiple countries. Given its critical role in supporting ongoing technological advancements, American Tower Corporation […]

headline: Medical Properties Q2 NFFO Misses Estimates, Revenues Fall Y/Y
summary: MPW's Q2 results reflect lower-than-anticipated NFFO per share. A fall in revenues and a rise in interest expenses in the quarter were spoilsports.

headline: Host Hotels Q2 FFO & Revenues Top Estimates, Hotel RevPAR Rises
summary: HST's Q2 results reflect a year over year rise in revenues due to comparable hotel RevPAR growth, driven by an increase in room rates and strong transient leisure demand.

headline: UBS reveals its latest top picks after July update
summary: Investing.com -- UBS has released its latest list of top stock picks following the July update, maintaining a neutral stance on U.S. equities overall but favoring specific sectors and names expected to outperform their respective benchmarks over the next 12 months.
